Рішення, засновані на законі та досвіді: Decisions based on law and experience
двокатське об’єднання «Колегія адвокатів: dvocacy association «Колегія адвокатів «Гранат» was created on March 9, 2011 and unites lawyers from extensive experience of practical work.
Ми є неурядовою організацією, а об’єданн: We are a non-governmental organization and a professional association of citizens.
Основний напрямок діяльності це надання: The main area of activity is the provision of qualified legal assistance to citizens, organizations and enterprises
Більшість нашіх адвокатів мають певну пр: Most of our lawyers have a certain legal specialization, thanks to which,
може запропонувати послуги в будь-якій г: can offer services in any field of law and provide qualified assistance on various issues to individuals and legal entities.
Правова допомога при створенні, ліквідац: Legal assistance in the creation, liquidation and transformation of enterprises of any organizational and legal form.
Оптимізація оподаткування. Супровід замо: Optimization of taxation. Support of customers in the process of resolving tax disputes, including in courts.
Правова допомога адвоката під час будь я: Legal assistance of a lawyer during any investigative action of pre-trial investigation bodies and during the serving of a sentence.
Представництво в судах всіх рівнів та юр: Representation in courts of all levels and jurisdictions (general, commercial, administrative)
Правова допомога в корпоративних правові: Legal assistance in corporate legal relations.
Створення, ліквідація та перетворення пі: Creation, liquidation and transformation of enterprises of any organizational and legal form.
Підготовка та проведення зборів учасникі: Preparation and holding of meetings of participants/shareholders.
Створення корпоративних структур із підп: Creation of corporate structures from enterprises for the realization of business goals.
Надання консультацій з ведення зовнішньо: Providing consultations on conducting foreign economic activities.
Юридична експертиза зовнішньоекономічних: Legal examination of foreign economic contracts.
працюємо в наступних напрямках:: we work in the following areas:
Представлення інтересів перед органами Д: Representation of interests before the bodies of the State Fiscal Service of Ukraine, including their investigative and operational divisions.
Підготовка відповідей на запити податков: Preparation of answers to requests of tax authorities, appeals of audit results and tax notices-decisions, as well as other decisions of tax authorities.
Захист інтересів в спорах із податковими: Protection of interests in disputes with tax authorities regarding fictitiousness of business relations and signs of fictitiousness of counterparty companies.
Правовий аналіз результатів податкових п: Legal analysis of the results of tax audits, administrative and judicial appeals.
Правова допомога адвоката під час досудо: Legal assistance of a lawyer during pre-trial investigation, during detention and during any investigative action of pre-trial investigation bodies.
Правова допомога адвоката під час відбув: Legal assistance of a lawyer while serving a sentence, release from serving a sentence, and changing conditions of detention.
Представництво в судах всіх рівнів та юр: Representation in courts of all levels and jurisdictions (general, economic, administrative).
Адвокати колегії мають багатий досвід ро: The lawyers of the collegium have extensive experience in the field of corporate relations. Some of them are former employees of large and small businesses with developed corporate structures.
Наші адвокати спеціалізуються на створен: Our lawyers specialize in the creation and management of advanced corporate structures. Members of the bar association constantly take part in holding general meetings of participants/shareholders.
Наші спеціалисти мають досвід в судових: Our specialists have experience in court proceedings conducted according to the rules of economic and administrative proceedings.
Члени Колегії адвокатів постійно приймаю: Members of the College of Advocates constantly take part in training seminars. Therefore, both in practice and in theory, they are familiar with the procedural rights and obligations of the participants in the legal process.
Адвокат має низку прав, які надають можл: A lawyer has a number of rights that provide the opportunity to receive additional information and materials from state authorities, local governments, their officials and officials, etc. This can significantly affect the project implementation process.
УЧАСТЬ ЕКСПЕРТІВ В РЕАЛІЗАЦІЇ ПРОЕКТІВ: PARTICIPATION OF EXPERTS IN PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION
Адвокати, у зв’язку із професійною діяль: Lawyers, in connection with their professional activities, have an understanding of the expert environment on the issues that are the subject of the project, and therefore will be able to attract specialists, experts on issues that require special knowledge, if this is required during the implementation of the project.
Саме адвокати, мають професійну можливіс: It is the lawyers who have a professional opportunity to comprehensively evaluate the project management compared to lawyers and other specialists who do not have experience in possible forensic support of cases.
СПЕЦІАЛІЗАЦІЯ В РІЗНІХ ГАЛУЗЯХ ПРАВА: SPECIALIZATION IN DIFFERENT FIELDS OF LAW
Реалізація проекту вимагає спеціальних з: Implementation of the project requires special knowledge in more than one area of legal relations. It is the bar association, which includes lawyers who specialize in various fields of law, that will provide an opportunity to obtain a comprehensive and full assessment of the prospects of the feasibility of the project and implement this project.
Вся інформація, яка отримується адвоката: All information obtained by lawyers in the course of legal practice is protected by legal professional secrecy, and lawyers have guarantees of legal practice in accordance with the Law of Ukraine «On Advocacy and Legal Practice»
Підприємства групи ЗЗБК №1: Enterprises of the ZZBK No. 1 group
спеціалізуються на: девелопменті, проект: specialize in: development, design, construction of buildings and structures from precast reinforced concrete. Own production base, equipped with modern European equipment.
об'єднує групу торгово-промислових компа: unites a group of trade and industrial companies from various business areas - production of products, alcoholic beverages, agricultural products, customs warehousing services, distribution of liquor and vodka products, cosmetics, food products, vehicles.
понад десятків років займається проектам: has been engaged in projects in the field of IT for more than ten years. Has a large number of clients and vendors with whom they have been partners for many years. They work with many branches and industries.
Має 2000 найменувань продукції. Виробни: It has 2000 product names. Production is carried out on modern equipment, according to the latest technologies.
Інжинірінгова компания, займаєтьс розроб: An engineering company engaged in the development and implementation of power supply and automation solutions for energy, industry, real estate and construction projects.
Наше адвокатське об'єднання займається р: Our bar association is engaged in various types of charitable activities aimed at supporting various groups of people or causes. Here are some areas of charitable activity for the bar association:
Адвокати надають безкоштовну правову доп: Lawyers provide free legal assistance to indigent clients, persons with disabilities, victims of violence or others in need. This activity includes consultations, preparation of documents and defense in court.
Адвокатське об'єднання організовує семін: The Bar Association organizes seminars, lectures and other educational events to increase the legal literacy of the community and provide information about their rights and responsibilities.
Адвокати надає безкоштовну або знижену ц: Lawyers provide free or reduced price legal services to public organizations working in the fields of charity, human rights protection, ecology, etc.
Адвокатське об'єднання бере участь у про: The Bar Association participates in programs of human rights protection and protection of human rights, including the protection of the rights of minorities, refugees, immigrants and other vulnerable groups.
Наші адвокати є авторами статей, брошур: Our attorneys write articles, pamphlets, and videos to spread legal information to the community and help people understand their rights and responsibilities.
Адвокатське об'єднання фінансово підтрим: The Bar Association financially supports various charitable organizations and projects that contribute to the development of the community and the improvement of living conditions in it.
